    [D2] 1285. 아름이의 돌 던지기

    최대 1 분 소요

    1285. 아름이의 돌 던지기

    Code

    #include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
 
int main(void) {
    using namespace std;
 
    int T;
    cin >> T;
    for (int tc = 1; tc <= T; tc++) {
        int N;
        cin >> N;
        int arr[1000];
        int distance_arr[1000];
        int distance;
        int cnt = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
            int temp;
            int result = 100000;
            cin >> temp;
            arr[i] = temp;
 
            distance_arr[i] = abs(arr[i] - 0);
        }
 
        int min_value = 100000;
        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
            min_value = min(min_value, distance_arr[i]);
        }
     
        for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
            if (distance_arr[j] == min_value)
                cnt++;
        }
 
        cout << "#" << tc << " " << min_value << " " << cnt << '\n';
    }
 
 
}

    카테고리: Swea

    업데이트: February 2, 2020
